rule: transfer function should return a boolean success value.
burn function should return a boolean success value.
The function _transfer should check if the sender has enough tokens using require(balanceOf[_from] >= _value) instead of require(balanceOf[_from] > _value).
The burn function should check if the sender has enough tokens using require(balanceOf[msg.sender] >= _value) instead of require(balanceOf[msg.sender] > _value).
The contract lacks the transferFrom, approve, and allowance functions which are required for ERC20 compliance.
The contract lacks the Approval event which must trigger on any successful call to approve(address _spender, uint256 _value).
